StrategyA - Class in pl.polsl.viktordidyk.baconcipher.model
Transcript the message in the following way: Capital letter is encrypted as a Non-capital letter is encrypted as b pig -> aaab aaab bbba -> FFFg SSSf gggA

StrategyB - Class in pl.polsl.viktordidyk.baconcipher.model
